ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:34:32 [Issue ID 4000-39184] urn:comicvine:4000-39184
ComicInfo.Summary:
The angel Remiel pays a visit to Lucifer Morningstar to ask him a very important question. Meanwhile, Lyta Hall embarks on a journey that sends her through myths and legend, and Morpheus resurrects an old friend. "The Kindly Ones" part 4.
Remiel searches for Lucifer to ask him to return to hell, while Lyta debates herself between madness and reality trying to find the furies. The Corintian is also reborn.
